title: Philip Rivers, Joey Bosa interviews, Devonta Freeman gets PAID (Football 08/09)
description:
Nick Kostos and Will Brinson open up the Pick Six by breaking down Devonta Freeman's extension with the Falcons (:40) and reveal a startling fact about the Jaguars RB group (4:00). The guys delve into Tyrone Crawford's injury for the Cowboys (8:38) and whether Jason Garrett could be on the hot seat (13:00). Nick guarantees a team will go 0-16 (15:30) and the gang talks the Patriots and their new private planes and compare them to House Lannister (25:00). Pete Prisco joins the show live from Los Angeles (26:00) and they play a game: Is this a Jets WR or a made-up name (27:00)? Pete reveals who would win between the 2008 Lions and 2017 Jets (28:30) and then talks Rams (31:00), with takes on Goff, the defense and offensive line.The trio break down Game of Thrones (38:45) and reveal their top-three favorite TV shows (50:30). Pete then talks Chargers (53:40) and reveals a hilarious golf story involving Will (1:01:30). We close with Jason La Canfora's one-on-one interviews with Philip Rivers (1:08:57) and Joey Bosa (1:14:00).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
